summary: Snoopy is a famous dog character from the *Peanuts* comic strip. Created by Charles M. Schulz, he first appeared in 1950 and quickly became a beloved icon. Snoopy is a beagle who often imagines himself as a World War I pilot or an author. He is known for his unique personality and is even more famous than the comic's main character, Charlie Brown, in some places. The character was inspired by Schulz's real-life dog, Spike.
title: Snoopy
